name: @lcrespilho/playwright-utils
description: Coleção de funções utilitárias que utilizo frequentemente com o Playwright

scripts.publish-prod-patch: npm version patch --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish-prod-minor: npm version minor --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish-prod-major: npm version major --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish-dev-patch: npm version prepatch --preid dev --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.publish-dev-minor: npm version preminor --preid dev --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.publish-dev-major: npm version premajor --preid dev --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.publish-dev-prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid dev --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && tsc && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.jsdoc2markdown: jsdoc2md --files dist/index.js > README.md && cat README.leo >> README.md
